name: Bernackels' Shoggoth
description: Shoggoth is a multiplayer (4vs2) stealth game, in which the player takes on the role of a small dragon. With the ability to fly and to morph into items, your mission is either to seek and kill your opponents or to search for keys and escape the level.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7/8/10 64-bit Processor: Intel Core i3-4170 or AMD FX-8120 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 480 1GB or AMD HD 5870 1GB DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 3200 MB available space Additional Notes: Optimized for stereo headphones
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7/8/10 64-bit Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 or AMD Ryzen5-1600 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 or AMD R9 290 DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 3200 MB available space Additional Notes: Optimized for stereo headphones
